content:
I see that Wasmtime v33.0.0 has been released.
Can I call on someone to merge the Running Wasm Components From the Command Line article that coincides with the release?
Thanks so much.
cc: @Andrew Brown

blog: Running Wasm Components From the Command Line (approved) by tpmccallum · Pull Request #126 · bytecodealliance/bytecodealliance.org
This is an article demonstrating how to use the wasmtime run --invoke feature. It explains WAVE syntax and implements a component with an exported function that is invoked in the Wasmtime CLI. Rela...
Thank you @Timothy McCallum for the blog post! (And thanks for making sure it was published today, @Andrew Brown.)

Pleasure @David Bryant,
Also, thanks to @Victor Adossi and @bjorn3 for the extensive review comments; lifting the article and ensuring it remains technically correct (the best kind of correct :smiley: ).
